articles.title: Russia hits southern Ukraine city, killing grain exporter, governor says
articles.description: Heavy Russian strikes hit the southern Ukrainian port city of Mykolaiv overnight and early on Sunday, killing the owner of one of the country's largest grain producing and exporting companies, the local governor said.

articles.author: Fox Business
articles.title: Mega Millions jackpot: How much will winner owe in taxes?
articles.description: The tax bill depends on whether the Mega Millions winner chooses a cash payout of $780.5 million or annual payments totaling $1.3 billion over 29 years.
articles.content:
The billion-dollar Mega Millions jackpot has finally been claimed in Illinois after being purchased at a Speedway gas station in Des Plaines.
But how much of that will end up in the winner’s pocket,… [+1967 chars]

articles.title: Georgia authorities release body camera footage after woman dies following fall from patrol car

articles.author: Andy Rose and Christina Maxouris, CNN
articles.title: 2 cyclists killed and 3 injured by an SUV that crossed over the center line, authorities say
articles.description: Two cyclists were killed and three were injured Saturday morning when an SUV crossed over the center line while trying to pass another vehicle, Michigan authorities said.
articles.content: Two cyclists were killed and three were injured Saturday morning when an SUV crossed over the center line while trying to pass another vehicle, Michigan authorities said.
